user_query: My company is organizing an event on Islamic culture. Can you help us with information about Islamic art, music, and literature? Additionally, we would like to have a chat with your Islam&AI Bot to discuss the significance of these cultural aspects.

TaskList.description: Gather information about Islamic art, including key styles, notable artists, and historical significance.
Collect information on Islamic music, focusing on its historical development, key genres, and influential musicians.
Research Islamic literature, covering significant works, authors, and themes present in the literature.
Initiate a chat with the Islam&AI Bot to discuss and understand the cultural significance of Islamic art, music, and literature.
